name: CHHapticDeviceCapability
desc: A protocol that defines haptics and audio capabilities of a device.

items.name: var supportsAudio: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports audio event playback.

items.name: var supportsHaptics: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device supports haptic event playback.

items.name: func attributes(forDynamicParameter: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID) -> CHHapticParameterAttributes
items.desc: Requests the haptic device’s attributes for a dynamic parameter.

items.name: func attributes(forEventParameter: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID, eventType: CHHapticEvent.EventType) -> CHHapticParameterAttributes
items.desc: Returns the haptic device’s attributes for an event parameter.
